There were no other sightings in Barnstable on or around September 19th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from my brothers house with my son around 8:15ish, i looked off to my left which would be looking south west while driving west on w. main st.as i looked up i noticed a cone shaped beam of light that was whitish in color. there seemed to be a fog or mist accompanied with the light. the object\light didn't seem to be that high up and was at about 45 degrees up from the horizon. i told my son to look at the object and he was kinda surprised to see this as we had previously seen some strange lights in the sky 2 weeks earlier. we witnessed this light and mist for maybe a min and appeared stationary then it just vanished like smoke dissipating. the light itself appeared to look like a street light kinda flat on top and round on the bottom with a cone shaped light emanating from it into the mist\fog. sorry for the crude drawing.
